person.bio: Software Engineer with a passion for everything new and challenging in life and technology. I strongly believe that the technology can help to create a better world and that is exactly the mission of the ThreeFold ,I find it very important for people to have equal chances, and a lot can be changed through technology these days.
person.excerpt: Software Engineer with a passion for everything new and challenging in life and technology.
